hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
umask 0022
CLANG_VERSION=3.8 echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/ python client.py checkout
rm -rf mozilla/extensions/purple hg clone http://hg.mozilla.org/users/florian_queze.net/purple mozilla/extensions/purple # Temporary workaround. Breaks the build otherwise sed -i "/EXTRA_DSO_LDOPTS/d" mozilla/extensions/purple/purplexpcom/src/Makefile.in
echo "Cleanup" ./mozilla/mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF #ac_add_options --enable-debug ac_add_options --verbose ac_add_options --enable-application=im ac_add_options --enable-extensions=purple mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j23" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Rebuild all"
scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION ./mozilla/mach --log-no-times build -v||true # Rebuild a second time to fix the issues scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION ./mozilla/mach --log-no-times build -v
echo "Only rebuild instantbird and not fx" cd obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu cat > rebuild.sh <<EOF set -e make export make export COMPS=CXX=/usr/share/clang/scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION/c++-analyzer CC=/usr/share/clang/scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION/ccc-analyzer cd extensions/purple && make -j1 clean \$COMPS && cd - cd extensions/purple/libpurple/ && make -j1 clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd extensions/purple && make -j1 all \$COMPS && cd - cd chat/&& make -j1 clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd mozilla/extensions/purple && make -j1 clean all && cd - cd im/ && make clean -j1 all \$COMPS && cd - EOF
chmod +x rebuild.sh
scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION -analyzer-config stable-report-filename=true --use-c++=/usr/bin/clang++-$CLANG_VERSION $(pwd)/rebuild.sh
cd ..
echo "Retrieve the last scan-build (-o of scan-build is failing)" SCAN_BUILD_DIR=$(ls -1d /tmp/scan-build-*|tail -1) mkdir -p reports/ TARGET=reports/instantbird-scan-build rm -rf $TARGET
echo "Move $SCAN_BUILD_DIR" mv $SCAN_BUILD_DIR $TARGET
echo "Set correct permissions" chmod o+r $TARGET*
echo "Send it" rsync -arv -R $TARGET sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/ # --delete removed because of .htaccess & .htpasswd
rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
